cause.description:
In 10-15 years from now the Gorillas will be extinct. If you would like you good adopt a primate you can go to our home page and when you do click "links" and there you will find a bunch of links and everyone of them has a page to adopt a primate/rainforest. Children Helping Improve Rainforest and Primate Awareness.The top 25 species will be gone, like wiped of the face of the earth gone. The most endangered primates are the Cross River Gorilla and the Eastern Gorilla. For almost every kind of primate, there is only 12 left of its kind.
1. Primates are an animal and need to not be hunted anymore
2. Rainforests are a part of our enviroment, and we are supposed to pretect it
cause.mission: Save primates and rainforests from becoming extinct
cause.name: C.H.I.R.P.A.
